title: How to score 310+ score in GRE with 2 months of preparation. Do you recommend any coaching online or offline. And what are best books for Quant and Verbal - Quora
tags: Graduate School Admission Tests and Exams

response.answer_text: If you're good at quants then you can prepare by yourself.Finish all the problems in Manhattan 5Lb.If you can complete it,you will be able to get a perfect score of 170.Then ace yourself with English.Concentrate on RC's .Read The Scientific American,The Atlantic and The Newyork Times.Familiarize yourself with all the models.In Last 15 days Take practice tests.Atleast try 6 tests and at the end take an ETS test.Your final score will be +- 5 to that.Do not skip the essays section even during mocks.All the best.Hope this helped

Ets official guidemagoosh flashcardsmanhattan guides n 5lb..And give alot of tests of kaplan,manhattan,majortests,princeton,powerprep!If you wish buy a magoosh account and for all books pdf download gre package from torrent!
